Theta*: Simple Any-Angle Algorithm based on A*

31 Aug 2020 Introduction Taking a look at ROS1’s navigation stack, the global planner’s default implementation is either A* or Dijkstra, both of which are classic path planning algorithms that work for navigating simple and structured environments. However, both algorithms fall short when it comes to achieving the true shortest possible path between...

Introducing Hyde

28 Dec 2013 Hyde is a brazen two-column Jekyll theme that pairs a prominent sidebar with uncomplicated content. It’s based on Poole, the Jekyll butler.
